name: jarvis
description: Project Seamus. Cortana and ChatGPT Integration This project demonstrates the integration of Cortana and OpenAI's ChatGPT to create an interactive voice-based AI chatbot. The user interacts with Cortana via voice, and Cortana sends the user's message to ChatGPT, which responds with a detailed answer. If the response is lengthy, Cortana will provide a summarized version and email the full response to a specified email address using EmailJS.
author: Cary Cunningham
